author: Peter Wright
content: Just hope the record breaking mammy,daddy of them all doent turn up.

author: Jean-Pierre Declemy
content: So, if Willy is right, perhaps the sharks are anticipating a good fish super of ‘easy catch’

author: Willy
content:
I cant help but wonder how loud the speakers are being played at. Granted heavy metal users might like it loud. Yet I am under the impression that loud noises in water is more damaging.

Please correct me if I am wrong.
